metadata.title: CVE-2020-8035 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: The image view functionality in Horde Groupware Webmail Edition before5.2.22 is affected by a stored Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability viaan SVG image upload containing a JavaScript payload. An attacker can obtainaccess to a victim's webmail account by making them visit a malicious URL.

criterions.comment: php-horde: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
